TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase

summary.span: 表示 Windows 。

span.span: Represents a Windows .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用給使用者的選項，例如 true/false 或 yes/no。Use a to give the user an option, such as true/false or yes/no. 控制項可以顯示的影像或文字或兩者。The control can display an image or text or both. 和控制項有類似的函式： 它們可讓使用者可從中選擇的選項清單。 and controls have a similar function: they allow the user to choose from a list of options. 控制項可讓使用者選取的選項組合。 controls let the user pick a combination of options. 相反地，控制項可讓使用者可從中選擇互斥選項。In contrast, controls allow a user to choose from mutually exclusive options. 屬性會決定是否會顯示為一般或按鈕。The property determines whether the appears as a typical or as a button. 屬性決定控制項是否支援兩個或三個狀態。The property determines whether the control supports two or three states. 使用屬性來取得或設定兩個狀態的值控制，並使用屬性來取得或設定值的三種狀態控制項。Use the property to get or set the value of a two-state control and use the property to get or set the value of a three-state control. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`true`、屬性會傳回`true`已核取或是不定狀態。If the property is set to `true`, the property will return `true` for either a checked or indeterminate state. 屬性決定的樣式和控制項的外觀。The property determines the style and appearance of the control. 如果屬性設定為，使用者的作業系統決定控制項的外觀。If the property is set to , the user's operating system determines the appearance of the control. > [!NOTE] > 當屬性設定為、屬性會被忽略，控制項會顯示使用或對齊方式。When the property is set to , the property is ignored and the control is displayed using the or alignment. 如果屬性設定為其中一個向右對齊、 使用顯示控制項對齊; 否則它就會顯示使用對齊方式。If the property is set to one of the right alignments, the control is displayed using the alignment; otherwise, it is displayed using the alignment. 以下描述為未決狀態： 您尚未，決定如果中選取的文字為粗體。The following describes an indeterminate state: You have a that determines if the selected text in a is bold. 當您選取的文字，您可以按一下要以粗體顯示選取項目。When you select text you can click the to bold the selection. 同樣地，當您選取一些文字，顯示選取的文字是粗體。Likewise, when you select some text, the displays whether the selected text is bold. 如果您選取的文字包含文字是粗體和一般，必須為未決狀態。If your selected text contains text that is bold and normal, the will have an indeterminate state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化，因而提供給它的切換按鈕的外觀，設定至`false`，並將它加入。The following code example creates and initializes a , gives it the appearance of a toggle button, sets to `false`, and adds it to a . [!code-cpp[Classic CheckBox.CheckBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckBox.CheckBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CheckBox.CheckBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckBox.CheckBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CheckBox.CheckBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckBox.CheckBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值設定為、具有一般外觀。If value is set to , the has a typical appearance. 如果值設定為`Button`、會像是切換按鈕，可以切換為開啟或關閉狀態。If the value is set to `Button`, the appears like a toggle button, which can be toggled to an up or down state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化，因而提供給它的切換按鈕的外觀，設定至`false`，並將它加入。The following code example creates and initializes a , gives it the appearance of a toggle button, sets to `false`, and adds it to a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`false`、屬性值只能設定為`CheckState.Indeterminate`程式碼中，而不是由使用者互動。If the property is set to `false`, the property value can only be set to `CheckState.Indeterminate` in code and not by user interaction. 下表描述的其不同狀態的控制項`Normal`和`Button`設定控制項的樣式。The following table describes the of the control in its different states for the `Normal` and `Button` style control . |已核取 CheckStateCheckState|Appearance.NormalAppearance.Normal|Appearance.ButtonAppearance.Button| |----------------|-----------------------|-----------------------| |`Checked`|顯示核取記號。The displays a check mark.|控制項下凹。The control appears sunken.| |`Unchecked`| 是空的。The is empty.|該控制項會出現引發。The control appears raised.| |`Indeterminate`|顯示核取記號，並會加上陰影。The displays a check mark and is shaded.|控制項是平面的。The control appears flat.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會在標籤中顯示三個屬性的值。The following code example displays the values of three properties in a label. 屬性間切換`true`和`false`以不同的控制項和交替使用`MiddleRight`和`MiddleLeft`值。The property alternates between `true` and `false` with alternating clicks of the control and the alternates between the `MiddleRight` and `MiddleLeft` values of . 此範例示範如何將屬性值變更為會檢查屬性變更和控制項。This example shows how the property values change as the property changes and the control is checked. 這個範例需要，和具有所有已具現化表單上，標籤是大到足以顯示三行文字，以及參考命名空間。This example requires that a , and have all been instantiated on a form and that the label is large enough to display three lines of text, as well as a reference to the namespace. 此程式碼中應該呼叫控制項的事件處理常式。This code should be called in the event handler of the control. summary.span: 引發 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法變更屬性。The method changes the property. 如果屬性設定為`true`，後續的按一下會導致進行的所有值循環列舉型別。If the property is set to `true`, subsequent clicks of the will result in cycling through all the values of the enumeration. 否則，間切換和。Otherwise, switches between and . 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override bool ProcessMnemonic (char charCode);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function ProcessMnemonic (charCode As Char) As Boolean
protected public: override bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode);

span.span: The character to process.

summary.span: 處理助憶鍵字元。

span.span: Processes a mnemonic character.

returns.span: 如果控制項已將字元當成助憶鍵處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法被呼叫要讓控制項有機會處理助憶鍵字元。This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 這個方法應判斷控制項是否處於處理助憶鍵的狀態，而且是否指定的字元是否表示助憶鍵。The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果因此，此方法應該執行的助憶鍵和傳回相關聯的動作`true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 實作這個方法通常會使用方法來判斷指定的字元是否符合控制項的文字中的助憶鍵。Implementations of this method often use the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text. 例如: For example: ```csharp if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` 預設實作方法只會傳回`false`來表示控制項具有沒有助憶鍵。This default implementation of the method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範會覆寫 按鈕類別的延伸至展現自訂行為的方法。The following code example demonstrates an extension of the button class that overrides the method to exhibit custom behavior. 此範例也示範如何使用和屬性。The example also demonstrates the use of the and properties. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼的表單類別之後，在相同的檔案。To run this example, paste the following code after a form class, in the same file. 加入按鈕的型別`MnemonicButton`至表單。Add a button of type `MnemonicButton` to the form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/VB/form1.vb#1)]

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`false`、屬性值只能設定為`Indeterminate`值程式碼中，而不是由使用者互動。If the property is set to `false`, the property value can only be set to the `Indeterminate` value of in code and not by user interaction. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會在標籤中顯示三個屬性的值。The following code example displays the values of three properties in a label. 屬性間切換`true`和`false`以不同的控制項和交替使用`MiddleRight`和`MiddleLeft`值。The property alternates between `true` and `false` with alternating clicks of the control and the alternates between the `MiddleRight` and `MiddleLeft` values of . 此範例示範如何將屬性值變更為會檢查屬性變更和控制項。This example shows how the property values change as the property changes and the control is checked. 此程式碼需要，和具有所有已具現化表單上，標籤是大到足以顯示三行文字，以及參考命名空間。This code requires that a , and have all been instantiated on a form and that the label is large enough to display three lines of text, as well as a reference to the namespace. 此程式碼中應該呼叫控制項的事件處理常式。This code should be called in the event handler of the control. [!code-cpp[Classic CheckBox.CheckAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckBox.CheckAlign Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CheckBox.CheckAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckBox.CheckAlign Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CheckBox.CheckAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckBox.CheckAlign Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
